The aim of the project is to build a predictive model for classifying people into one of two possible classes: "user" and "non user".

The project uses the CRISP_DM methodology. The final result was achieved in the following steps:

1. understanding the problem.
2. exploratory data analysis and selection of the target variable.
3. selection and evaluation of models.
4. quality assessment. 
5. recommendation.

```{r include=FALSE}
library(tidyverse)
library(funModeling)
```
